com.blockwithme.util.xtend

Class FuzzyExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.blockwithme.util.xtend.FuzzyExtension

  • public class FuzzyExtension
extends Object
    Xtend Extension related to basic "fuzzy logic" operations. It is assumed that all input values are already clamped to [0,1].
    Author:
    monster

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FuzzyExtension()

      • clampLocal

        public static float[] clampLocal(float[] values)
        Clamps "locally" float values to the fuzzy logic range. This method has therefore "side-effects" (unpure).
        Returns:
        the original, modified, array.
